products.name: Wireless Earbuds
products.description: Experience true wireless freedom with these earbuds. Enjoy clear and detailed sound with deep bass and superior noise isolation.

products.name: Smart Watch
products.description: Stay connected and organized with this smart watch. Monitor your fitness, receive notifications, and control your music all from your wrist.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Enjoy high-quality sound anywhere with this portable speaker. Connect wirelessly to your phone or tablet and listen to your favorite music on the go.

products.name: Power Bank
products.description: Never run out of battery again with this power bank. Charge your phone, tablet, or other devices on the go and stay connected all day long.

products.name: Wireless Charger
products.description: Charge your phone without the hassle of cords with this wireless charger. Simply place your phone on the pad and enjoy fast and convenient charging.

products.name: Action Camera
products.description: Capture all of life's adventures with this action camera. Take stunning photos and videos of your outdoor activities and relive them again and again.

products.name: Gaming Mouse
products.description: Take your gaming to the next level with this high-performance mouse. Enjoy fast and precise movement, customizable buttons, and ergonomic design.

products.name: Fitness Tracker
products.description: Monitor your health and fitness with this smart tracker. Track your steps, calories burned, and sleep patterns and get motivated to reach your goals.
